overview:
Steve co-founded Global Personals Ltd with Ross Williams in 2003, Europe’s largest privately owned online dating and social discovery business with annualized revenues in excess of $74m.

Steve is Chief Operating Officer and is responsible for the company’s WhiteLabelDating.com division, a core driver of the growth and market penetration of the brand. The enables media publishers and individuals to power their own-branded dating websites,currently including The Independent, Bauer Media and PlentyMoreFish as partners.

Steve works with the global network of partners to increase their revenues and aid them in growing their businesses. Steve’s role is to build relationships and forge long-lasting partnerships with organizations including national broadcasters and publishers.

In its eight years of operating, Global Personals Ltd has welcomed over 12 million members, signed 1,500 partners and launched over 7,000 sites across 5 networks in 7 countries (South Africa, Canada, USA, Australia, New Zealand, Ireland and the UK).
